Operation 'transcoder.projects.locations.jobTemplates.delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks critical details about what identifier is needed, the irreversible nature of deletion, and what is returned. AI agents need to understand this is a destructive operation with side effects.

data.description_suggestion: Deletes a specified job template resource. Requires the full resource name (name parameter) of the job template to delete. Once deleted, the job template cannot be recovered. Returns an empty response on successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks critical details about what identifier is needed, the irreversible nature of deletion, and what is returned. AI agents need to understand this is a destructive operation with side effects.

data.current_description: Creates a job in the specified region.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new transcoding job in the specified region. Accepts a Job object in the request body containing the job configuration, input/output settings, and processing parameters. Returns the newly created Job resource with assigned job ID and initial processing status.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about request body requirements and return value. AI agents need to know what Job configuration is required and that the created job resource with status is returned.

Operation 'transcoder.projects.locations.jobTemplates.delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks critical details about what identifier is needed, the irreversible nature of deletion, and what is returned. AI agents need to understand this is a destructive operation with side effects.

data.description_suggestion: Deletes a specified job template resource. Requires the full resource name (name parameter) of the job template to delete. Once deleted, the job template cannot be recovered. Returns an empty response on successful deletion.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks critical details about what identifier is needed, the irreversible nature of deletion, and what is returned. AI agents need to understand this is a destructive operation with side effects.

data.current_description: Lists job templates in the specified region.

message: Operation 'transcoder.projects.locations.jobTemplates.create' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. data.current_description: Creates a job template in the specified region.
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new job template resource

data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about request body requirements and return value. AI agents need to know what JobTemplate properties are required and that the created resource is returned.

message: Operation 'transcoder.projects.locations.jobs.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. data.summary_suggestion: List transcoding jobs in a region
data.description_suggestion: Lists all transcoding jobs in the specified region. Supports pagination through page_size and page_token parameters. Returns a ListJobsResponse containing an array of Job resources with their current status and metadata.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description omits pagination support and return type details. AI agents need to understand pagination capabilities and that Job status information is included in the response.

message: Operation 'transcoder.projects.locations.jobs.create' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about request body requirements and return value. AI agents need to know what Job configuration is required and that the created job resource with status is returned.

data.current_description: Creates a job in the specified region.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new transcoding job in the specified region. Accepts a Job object in the request body containing the job configuration, input/output settings, and processing parameters. Returns the newly created Job resource with assigned job ID and initial processing status.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about request body requirements and return value. AI agents need to know what Job configuration is required and that the created job resource with status is returned.

Missing summary entirely. Description lacks critical details about what identifier is needed, the irreversible nature of deletion, and what is returned. AI agents need to understand this is a destructive operation with side effects.
